body.name: SYLVOX 55 Inch Outdoor TV, Waterproof 4K Smart TV, High Brightness,7x16(H) Commercial Grade, Supports Wireless Connection & Wi-Fi, ARC &CEC, Suitable for Partial Sun (Deck series)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
features: Excellent Picture Quality: The outdoor TV is equipped with 3840*2160 ultra-high resolution (4K), high brightness, which can provide an excellent viewing effect in the outdoor environment during the day.

Rugged and Durable: Aluminum alloy housing with anti-corrosion and anti-scratch finish, the TV is not easy to be damaged, making this outdoor TV more suitable for your backyard and has a longer lifespan.
Wider Application: The weatherproof TV is IP55 waterproof, no matter where it is installed, there is no need to worry about the TV being damaged by rain.

Smart TV: LED TV support ATSC, Built-in Netrange app store, pre-install official genuine apps ( Netflix, youtube, Pandora HTML5 Twitter, Facebook, Accu weather, miracast Rx).Downloading other apps is not currently supported.
More functions: Outdoor TV is equipped with WiFi, wireless connection function, with ARC &CEC. technology, which is convenient for you to better connect and control other devices.
body.description: Watching exciting sports events and live programs outdoo rs is a wonderful life experience.1. SYLVOX Outdoor TV is a special TV treated with a professional process. IP 55 grade waterproof case, IP 66 grade waterproof remote control can withstand rain, dust, extreme temperature damage, and can be installed directly on the outdoor walls.Since the performance and waterproof grade of indoor TV can not meet the requirements that used outdoor. Thus a home TV is prohibited from being used in an outdoor humid and high-temperature environment, which is noted clearly in the user manual.2.Excellent picture quality: SYLVOX outdoor TV is equipped with 3840 * 2160 resolution and ultra-high definition display, high brightness ,4 times to home TV,which offers an excellent viewing effect.3.Home use: it can be installed on the deck, porch, terrace, pavilion, swimming pool, bathtub, under the eaves, wooden house, etc.4.Commercial: it can be installed in outdoor cafes, restaurants, shopping malls, corridors, airports, stadiums, public swimming pools, clubs, resort hotel.Specifications:Official genuine apps (such as Netflix, youtube, Pandora, HTML5) and support twitter, Facebook, accu weather, miracast RxResolution:3840*2160Aspect Ratio: 16 : 9Alimentation:AC 100-240V 50 / 60HZAudio Output:L / R10Wx2Ports: ARC&CEC*3,USB*2,AV,Ypbpr,RJ45,EARPHONE OUT,OPTICAL,RFOperating temperature: -22°F to 122°F (-30℃-50℃)Wall mount specification (VESA): 600*400mm,Screw hole specifications:M8Note:1.For direct sunlight environment, it is recommended to choose SYLVOX higher brightness TV series.2. Wall mount bracket is not included. It is recommended to choose SYLVOX TV bracket (VESA: 600*400mm)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SYLVOX is committed to creating outdoor TVs for all scenarios and providing customers with satisfactory products and services. 1. Outdoor TV adopt anti-glare screen, always give you comfortable viewing effect. 2. Durable waterproof TV: TV can work under the rain for a long time and can easily handle all kinds of weather. 3. SYLVOX Outdoor TV support ATSC, built-in Netrange app store, pre-install official genuine apps ( Netflix, Youtube, Pandora HTML5 Twitter, Facebook, accu weather, miracast Rx). You can connect to the port of the TV through a device that supports downloading apps, you can watch exciting Internet programs. The TV does not support downloading other apps. 4. Smart TV: SYLVOX weatherproof TV supports WiFi and wireless connection, you can connect to the Internet to watch your favorite programs.

4K Ultra HD HDR TV The 4K UHD HDR TV is equipped with 3840 * 2160 resolution, high-performance LED panel, 8bit color panel with 16.7 million colors. TV clarity is more than 80% higher than a full HD TV, providing you with an amazing picture. Built-in 20W dual speakers SYLVOX outdoor TVs are designed with the outdoor environment in mind, so they have built-in 20W high-quality dual speakers that provide you with high-quality audio output. Anti-glare outdoor TV The all weather outdoor TV with anti-glare design, 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle , always give you a comfortable viewing experience in the outdoor environment.

A weatherproof TV that can work in the rain No matter whether kids spill water or weather rainfall, Sylvox waterproof TV can handle it easily. Sylvox outdoor waterproof TV can work under the rain for long periods of time and can easily cope with all kinds of bad weather. Specifications: Aspect Ratio: 16 : 9 Alimentation：AC 100-240V 50 / 60HZ Ports: ARC&CEC*3, USB*2, AV, Ypbpr, RJ45, EARPHONE OUT, OPTICAL, RF Operating temperature: -22°F to 122°F (-30℃-50℃) Wall mount specification (VESA): 43’’ 400*200mm/55’’ 600*400mm/65’’ 600*400mm/75’’ 600*400mm Note: 1. Wall mount bracket is not included. It is recommended to choose SYLVOX TV bracket. 2. Sylvox TV is designed to have a long service life. In order to ensure the stability and smoothness of the TV system, in addition to the APP that comes with the TV, it is not supported to download other APPs. 3. Sylvox outdoor TVs are brighter and the screen temperature will be higher when the TV is working, so the TV is not allowed to have a flush mounting method. Allow at least 4 inches of space around the perimeter of the TV and on the back of the TV to allow the TV to dissipate sufficient heat to prevent damage to the TV components due to high temperatures.

Lightweight and waterproof TV Sylvox outdoor TV has an ultra-thin body, the thinnest point is only 1.7 inches, aluminum body, light and beautiful. Easy to install. High brightness outdoor TV The Sylvox 4K UHD TV With a 1000nit high brightness screen and the TV is 4 times brighter than a home TV, so you don't have to worry about not being able to see the TV picture outdoors. Rugged and durable Waterproof outdoor TV is made of aluminum alloy and covered with a special coating, which is sturdy and scratch-proof and can easily cope with outdoor heat, humidity, cold and other environments without aging for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SYLVOX 65 Inch Outdoor TV - Partial Sun(Deck Series)
reviews.reviewText: I received my TV on June 19th - delivery time was average but it is a large heavy TV. When I installed it I was impressed with the picture quality - I hooked up an Amazon 4K firestick and it works great. I had no problem setting up my Wi-Fi network. The TV remote seems heavy duty and weather proof. The wall I mounted to on my uncovered patio is always in partial shade - so I turned down the brightness and the picture looks great. Due to the fact the speakers are protected and the sound comes from the bottom of the TV - I recommend getting a sound bar but if you don't have one right away the sound seems fine. I did use their customer service for a minor replacement part - they were fast to ship it out to me and it did not affect me hanging my TV to the wall mounts.All in all - very good TV for the money - I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's In A Name
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't familiar with Sylvox but it's a name I won't forget now. After doing some research in outdoor TVs. The size, NITs, and QLED factors all led to me purchasing this unit. I can't be more pleased with the picture quality. As with most TVs the sound is best when paired with a sound bar. I give it four stars across the board. The overall score is 5 stars, and that's because of the customer service. In a word, stellar. Firstly, my puppy got to the remote so that was a wrap. I called and let them know exactly what happened, and they still replaced my remote, free of cost. Secondly, and most importantly, my unit sustained some water damage and was no longer operational. Suffice it to say... please still purchase a TV cover even though the unit is waterproof. Again, Kiko, Leeke, and the Sylvox customer team ensured I received a replacement unit at no cost. Can't speak high enough about my experience. Well recommend this company and product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright outdoors as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Preprogrammed Picture modes over saturated but easy to tweak.Speakers weak, added sound barGreat TV in the current market this price range

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV when you add your own external speaker
reviews.reviewText: Yes, we take it camping!! It fits our "roughing-it" lifestyle. The TV sat right there in the rain while we watched divisional playoffs outdoors. It worked GREAT. That big speaker below it helps the sound. As you might assume, a TV that's wrapped in metal, might not have the best sound quality. Thankfully, there's a headphone jack inside the weatherproof compartment, and it plugged right into my weatherproof speaker. If there were any improvements that I could want, they would be a place to attach a padlock/cable lock. While I had a lock on it, wrapped around the tree, it's only going through the mounting bracket, which can be removed with screws. Sylvox, help me make this more secure! The other thing I think it should have is an easy to remove weatherproof cover over all the ports. This thing has about a dozen tiny philips screws. Such a pain for how we use the TV. If we simply mounted this outdoors at home, then I wouldn't need frequent access. But as a mobile camping TV? I want in there. I paired this with a Roku, since the "smart" in this TV isn't all that smart. No apps like YouTube TV. Just the basics, like Netflix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Possibly Damaged Screen
reviews.reviewText: TV seems to be a great product but mine arrived in a pretty beat up box. Inside packaging seemed to hold up well and other than an extremely light scratch the tv seemed ok. After hanging 9’ to the bottom of the TV I noticed 2 green dots in the upper corner. Almost unnoticeable but definitely there. I will update after we deal with customer service but the problem is it was a ton of work and paid a guy to help me wall mount. Going to see if these dots disappear at all or may have to return. Super bummer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great outdoor TV...you won't regret this purchase
reviews.reviewText: If you need an actual outdoor rated TV, this is a great value. It arrived with great packaging which was surprisingly easy to unbox. TV is very solid and has a very bright picture even for a partial sun model. NOTE: We have it in a covered screened in porch and it works great. No issues with heat/cold.We did have a problem with the remote when it arrived, but Sylvox support was very responsive, quickly did some troubleshooting, and then immediately shipped out a replacement remote which paired and worked perfectly.I would highly recommend it for the quality product and outstanding and responsive support which doesn't seem to be common anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, very good customer service
reviews.reviewText: The product is a good value for the price. Clear picture and plenty of input options. Works very well with Sylvia sound bar in the ARC port. WiFi counted easily. Integrated apps are limited per description, Netflix and Prime are the only ones that matter. Would be an improvement to add more or support airplay. Does support screencast if you are a android user. First unit came with screen broken (probably due to UPS handling). Called customer service and they sent a replacement within 2 days and a free return label for the broken one. Customer service rep called multiple times to check on status and to make sure I was fully satisfied. Something many companies don’t do anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had an issue with set up, TV had a blank screen issue. Issue resolved!!
reviews.reviewText: Received TV as a gift. Upon setup, I had a blank screen issue and could not use TV. I contacted Sylvox and was helped by Kiko (Support). After discussing issue and possible solutions it was determined that a replacement TV was required. A new TV was sent and arrangements to pick up defective TV made by Kiko. New TV is working perfectly. Setup was easy and all looks great so far. Kiko’s customer service was excellent and much appreciated. Thanks for the help.
